amendment.description: To provide $390,000,000 in fiscal year 2007 for cancer funding in the National Institutes of Health, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, and the Health Resources and Services Administration paid for by closing corporate tax loopholes.

action.text: Amendment SA 3067 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Feinstein.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3067 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
